name: Hrizin Aviation
about: Horizon Aviation, based at TF Green Airport in Warwick, Rhode Island, is a full-service flight school dedicated to training pilots in a fun, friendly, and professional environment. We offer a range of programs, including Private Pilot, Commercial Pilot, Instrument Rating, and Certified Flight Instructor certifications. Our FAA-approved Part 141 course is structured into three phases: learning the basics of flying, navigating to nearby airports, and refining skills for the FAA checkride. We cater to students of all ages, with flexible scheduling to accommodate work or school commitments. Our career training program can have you earning a living as a professional pilot in as little as 18 months. At Horizon Aviation, we are committed to helping you realize your dreams of becoming a pilot.
